AuthorDetails.Name: Enterspeed
AuthorDetails.Description: Enterspeed is a Speed Layer transforming, consolidating, and storing content from multiple data sources. Unique to Enterspeed is the blazing fast Microsoft Azure cloud storage: Data is prepared for delivery to frontends at publish time, meaning that load on underlying systems is minimised.

Description: This package is deprecated. Use this package instead https://marketplace.umbraco.com/package/enterspeed.source.umbracocms

Screenshots.Caption: The Enterspeed configuration can be entered in the Umbraco backoffice and stored in the database or it can be configured in the appsettings.json.
Content, media and dictionary items are automatically send to Enterspeed on save and/or publish. Using the seed functionality you can resend all items to Enterspeed in one go.
